summary: Calculated Ocean Emissivity using Remote Sensing Systems (RSS)surface model for AMSR2
keywords: EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > ATMOSPHERIC RADIATION > EMISSIVITY
title: Ocean Surface Emissivity calculated from ERA5 neutral stability winds on a 0.25 degree Earth grid, time interpolated to satellite overpass time
history: Created from ERA5 data downloaded from the Copernicus Climate Data Store using the RSS surface radiation model
